description:
How has Koushi managed to befriend the dorm residents so quickly? Atena think he’s super sus! But when a shopping trip goes awry, will she be able to accept his help?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Kiriya et Serene posent problème / Le réveil d`Atena
Kiriya to Serene, Wakeari / Atena, Mezameru
Kiriya und Serene haben ihre Gründe / Athena kommt zu sich
The Problem with Kiriya and Serene / Atena Awakens
きりやとせれね, ワケあり / あてな, 目覚める
